title: Enhancing HR Management Practice Competencies: Blended Mobile Microlearning-Based Elementary Social Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Three or More Years of Elementary Education Experience and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners understand blended learning design principles and can apply at least three effective instructional strategies in practice
Learners can enhance educational effectiveness by 20% or more by designing 10-minute microlearning content in mobile environments
Learners can complete a project that improves learner engagement by 30% or more using online-offline interaction techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
